2bd20eee766a5eb278d25c67fb87c998f20a5af7.query: SELECT last_trade_id FROM user_trade_balances FOR UPDATE

38b9a4487c09ce6e43890cc32001931eb0dfdf65.query: UPDATE user_trade_balances SET current_balance = $1, last_trade_id = $2, updated_at = now() WHERE unit_id = $3

5c5325c7dd64793f5f50c172ce6039cf510981c3.query:
WITH amounts AS (
   SELECT MAX(id) as latest_id, buy_unit_id, SUM(buy_amount) AS to_sub, sell_unit_id, SUM(sell_amount) AS to_add 
   FROM user_trades
   WHERE id > $1
   GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((buy_unit_id), (sell_unit_id))
 )
SELECT
  unit_id,
  current_balance + COALESCE(sell_amounts.to_add, 0) - COALESCE(buy_amounts.to_sub, 0) AS new_balance,
  MAX(GREATEST(sell_amounts.latest_id, buy_amounts.latest_id)) OVER () AS new_latest_id
FROM user_trade_balances
LEFT JOIN amounts buy_amounts ON unit_id = buy_amounts.buy_unit_id
LEFT JOIN amounts sell_amounts ON unit_id = sell_amounts.sell_unit_id;

b64b1f2189c7b28ade7381b416bcd704cbb4a7df.query: SELECT unit_id, current_balance, last_trade_id FROM user_trade_balances

be8bf756668c83b336baea38f40ae17e64a7c4f9.query: UPDATE user_trades SET is_latest = NULL WHERE id = $1

e8ecf162bd74e5d883408481f98f01eb2354ff89.query: SELECT id, external_ref FROM user_trades WHERE is_latest = 'true'
